kariminf.as.process.extraction.cluster

Class NaiveCluster

  • java.lang.Object
    • kariminf.as.process.extraction.cluster.Cluster
      • kariminf.as.process.extraction.cluster.NaiveCluster

  • public class NaiveCluster
extends Cluster
    This is a naive clustering method based on cosine similarity and clustering threshold.
    1. Calculate cosine similarity between each two sentences.
    2. For each sentence, create a cluster containing it and similar sentences (similar sentences are sentences with similarity above the clustering threshold)
    3. Delete all clusters included in others
